author: Universal Pictures
description:
Paul Bäumer (Felix Kammerer) leads the charge from the trenches straight into the chaos of no man’s land.

Buy/Rent All Quiet on The Western Front! 
Amazon: https://www.amazon.ca/Quiet-Western-Front-George-Summerville/dp/B000KGGJ0Y/ref=asc_df_B000KGGJ0Y?tag=bingshopdesk-20&linkCode=df0&hvadid=80745476895829&hvnetw=o&hvqmt=e&hvbmt=be&hvdev=c&hvlocint=&hvlocphy=125197&hvtargid=pla-4584345025122972&psc=1
Apple TV: https://tv.apple.com/us/movie/all-quiet-on-the-western-front/umc.cmc.1df99n64rb9z199xsojz7kzuz
Prime Video: https://www.primevideo.com/detail/All-Quiet-on-the-Western-Front/0R5JLQ6RIGD67S1WUED0UNM3M1

In All Quiet on the Western Front, a group of young German recruits are thrown into the horrors of World War I, where idealism quickly fades and the fight for survival takes over. Paul’s journey is a raw portrait of lost innocence in the trenches of war.

© 1930 Universal Pictures. All Rights Reserved.
Cast: Lew Ayres, Louis Wolheim, John Wray, Slim Summerville, William Bakewell
